百選: (ひゃくせん) - top hundred; hundred best
百錬: (ひゃくれん) - well-tempered; well drilled; well trained
百難: (ひゃくなん) - all obstacles; all sorts of trouble
百面相: (ひゃくめんそう) - making different (comic) faces, esp. using small props
百鬼夜行: (ひゃっきやこう) - (yoji) many monsters, spirits, etc. forming a line and walking through the night; veritable pandemonium/large number of people plotting and doing evil/creepy characters roaming about presenting a most scandalous sight
皀莢: (サイカチ) - honey locust; Gleditsia japonica
的に達しない: (まとにたっしない) - falling short of the mark
的はずれ: (まとはずれ) - out of focus; off the point; miss the mark
的を射る: (まとをいる) - to be to the point; to be pertinent
的を当てる: (まとをあてる) - to hit the mark
的を得る: (まとをえる) - (prob. originated as a misuse of 的を射る but now in common use)  to be to the point; to be pertinent
的を絞る: (まとをしぼる) - to narrow in (on); to home in; to focus; to target
的を逸れる: (まとをそれる) - to miss the target
的中: (てきちゅう) - striking home/hitting the mark; coming true/proving to be right/becoming realized
的場: (まとば) - target area (e.g archery); range (e.g. rifle, firing)
的外れ: (まとはずれ) - out of focus; off the point; miss the mark
的屋: (てきや) - stall-keeper (esp. at a festival); street vendor; huckster; faker; hawker; seller of unreliable merchandise
的矢: (まとや) - arrow and target; arrow used for shooting marks
的矢かき: (まとやかき) - Matoya Oyster (from Matoya bay, Mie-ken)
的矢牡蠣: (まとやかき) - Matoya Oyster (from Matoya bay, Mie-ken)
的確: (てっかく) - precise; accurate; appropriate; exactly the right
皆々様: (みなみなさま) - Ladies and Gentlemen!; all of you; everyone
皆が皆: (みながみな) - each and all; every single one; everybody
皆まで言うな: (みなまでいうな) - don't finish what you're saying; stop what you're saying
皆中: (かいちゅう) - {sports} hitting all the targets (archery)
皆伝: (かいでん) - initiation into an art or discipline
皆兵制度: (かいへいせいど) - system of universal conscription
皆勤賞: (かいきんしょう) - reward or prize for perfect attendance
皆婚社会: (かいこんしゃかい) - marriage-oriented society (in which most people are married, usu. at a young age)
皆既日食: (かいきにっしょく) - total solar eclipse
皆既月食: (かいきげっしょく) - total eclipse of the moon
皆既蝕: (かいきしょく) - total eclipse (of sun by moon); totality
皆既食: (かいきしょく) - total eclipse (of sun by moon); totality
皆殺し: (みなごろし) - massacre; annihilation; wholesale slaughter
皆無: (kaimu) - inexistente, nulo, nenhum, nada (de nada), coisa nenhuma
皆皆様: (みなみなさま) - Ladies and Gentlemen!; all of you; everyone
皆納: (かいのう) - full payment of a tax
皇位継承: (こういけいしょう) - (Japanese) imperial succession
皇位継承者: (こういけいしょうしゃ) - heir to the throne; successor to the throne
皇別: (こうべつ) - clans supposedly descended from the imperial family
皇后宮: (こうごうぐう) - empress's residence; empress
皇后陛下: (こうごうへいか) - her majesty the Empress
皇大神宮: (こうたいじんぐう) - Koutai Shrine (the inner shrine of Ise Shrine)
皇太后: (こうたいこう) - Queen Mother; Empress Dowager
皇太子殿下: (こうたいしでんか) - the Crown Prince
皇太孫: (こうたいそん) - eldest grandson of an Emperor in the line of descent
皇孫: (こうそん) - imperial grandchild or descendant
皇室典範: (こうしつてんぱん) - the Imperial Household Law
皇室神道: (こうしつしんとう) - Imperial Household Shinto
皇室費: (こうしつひ) - the Imperial Household expenses
皇宮警察: (こうぐうけいさつ) - the Imperial Guards
皇帝ペンギン: (コウテイペンギン) - emperor penguin (Aptenodytes forsteri)
皇御孫: (すめみま) - grandchild of Amaterasu (i.e. Ninigi no Mikoto); descendant of Amaterasu/person of imperial lineage/emperor
皇族費: (こうぞくひ) - allowance allotted to the Imperial family
皇朝十二銭: (こうちょうじゅうにせん) - twelve coinages minted in Japan during the Nara and Heian periods
